Comments_List: I familiarized myself with the math and relationships behind several forms of matter.
got a good understanding of the fundamentals of chemistry and techniques

The strength is the ability to cover a wide range of topics from simple acid base reactions all the way to nuclear chemistry. The weakness is just that, as there is not nearly enough time to cover everything or allow for more digestion of the material.
Only if they needed to get this course out of the way. It is very stressful at this pace.
I would absolutely recommend this to another student
